title: Mermaids, Banshees, Vampires and Werewolves - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/10/17
itunes:title: Mermaids, Banshees, Vampires and Werewolves - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/10/17
description:
George Noory and guest Varla Ventura discuss her research into a number of paranormal creatures, including vampires, banshees, mermaids and werewolves, and if they actually exist.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
